I bought this bag around July. It worked out well at first. It now has a big rip at the side of the outside pocket by the stitching . I did not carry knives etch in my purse. I am sorely disappointed.

Love the color.  Bought it to match the scarf (Free People) in photo.  First thing I do to make sure something is authentic leather is smell it.  Nice leather smell.  Sturdy.  The metal parts are subtle, not loud and bright.  Holds it's shape.  Not too big or small.  May be a little deeper than I prefer (it can hold a book or water bottle) only because my purses tend to get messy, but it is not too deep.  One side has outside zipper perfect for a phone.  The inside has middle divider with zipper, so you can keep things in 3 different areas, plus a few interior side pouches.  Love the long strap which is adjustable like a belt, or you can use the short strap.  Stitching very sturdy.
This bag is beautiful, not big not small. I like the shinny leather and the simple design. The delivery was fast and the item was well packed. I recommend it!
Awesome bag!

This purse is wonderful and very high quality. The shape kind d if remind you of the shape of a bowling bag without the ball. It is all leather with handles and a strong shoulder strap to carry as a shoulder bag. It has a buckle on each side which can be adjusted to either loosen or tighten the sides of the bag. On the outside there is stitching all around the shape of the purse abd is the same color as the purse. There is also a zipper compartment on thr back where I put my go to items like my keys and lipstick. Now the inside is very deep and big. It's about nine inches deep and about eleven inches wide. There are three compartments in the middle: Two are open and the middle between the two are closed. The compartments are spacious and deep as well. You can also organize your stuff better. I have my tablet and headphones on one side, my wallet and other items on the other side, and in the middle is my makeup bag. Now on the inside of the purse on each side are smaller compartments. One is a zippered compartment which is about five inches deep and about seven inches wide. On the other side are two smaller compartments to either place your keys or phone. It has a chocolate cloth interior and overall the purse is lovely. Also on the bottom are four studs which props the purse off the floor or counter or wherever you lay it. Soft shiny and beautiful brown leather with organization and space. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review and all opinions are mine.

In all though, the pants are a pretty good buy for the money but don't expect long-term wear! Removed 1 star for running too big and gave 4 stars for fast shipping and pretty decent quality for the money.

These are some pretty good quality wool socks, particularly for the price. I purchased these for my boyfriend, who works in construction and wears heavy duty boots all day. He was pretty happy with the fit and said they were comfortable, and did a good job of absorbing the sweat on long summer days. I suspect they will do a decent job in winter, particularly if his usal thermal socks are not available and for the transitional time when it is cold, but cold enough to need thermals. Also, since these are fairly affordable, they can be easily replaced, which is good because he goes through socks pretty quickly. I received these at a discount in exchange for an honest review, however that did no affect my opinion of the product.

These wool socks are wonderful. They fit nicely and they hold their shape. They have held up well from the wash and haven't shrunk. reviewText:
This is for the black one with just horizontal straps in the back.

I really didn't expect this to fit, I mean, there weren't even size options! But it was inexpensive enough that I took a gamble and shockingly the fit was perfectly. One thing, after ordering this one i ordered the white one and it was much, much smaller and i had to return it. The black one fit like a M or maybe a S; the white one was like XS or smaller.

This bralette is super cute and trendy. I bought it for my roommate after reading the reviews that it runs small. She is a size medium, with broad shoulders, and a small B cup. The material is elastic so it stretches out and I'm sure with time and wear, it will stretch out even more. It was a bit tight on her, but not uncomfortable. She loves the style and the fitting. If she was any bigger in the chest, this wouldn't work. I don't recommend it for anyone C cup and above unless you have a small rib cage and small shoulders. The padding was fine, not overly padded. It isn't visible through the bralette. This needs to be hand washed, or at least hung up to dry. It is the kind of material and padding that will deform in the dryer.
I got this item at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

This is the perfect little bralette to wear under open back and/or sheer tops.  I had to try it as the price was so low.
The bralette is very soft fabric with elastic straps in the back.  The front is two layers and sandwiched in between the fabric are soft bra cups (similar to what is in a bandeau bra).  The cups are not seen into the fabric, so this means:
1. You can move them around to where you need the coverage.
2. This is not a bralette that will give anyone bigger than a small B cup support.
And
3.  This will need to be hand washed to maintain the shape(otherwise the cups will fold and warp)
None of these things detract from the bralette.  I really like it a lot.
I ordered this to fit a clothing size 3/4, bra size 32A.  It fits perfectly.  Photos attached.  It is opaque so it could be worn separate, but I bought it to go under other clothes.
The only drawbacks I can see are the straps are not adjustable.  But everything is very stretchy so it would probably fit most people.
A great purchase.  You can't beat the price, and the quality is great.  Just make sure you hand wash it and lay flat to dry!
**I received this bralette at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.  All of the opinions expressed above are one hundred percent my own.**
summary: A cute little bralette for a fabulous price!

reviewText:
I really, really like this bralette! I brought the exact same kind a few months ago and this one is by far a lot better quality. The other one was made entirely out of the material on the front, which is sort of like a jersey material, but maybe not as nice. This one though has the jersey material on the front, then the back it made up of stretchy elastic. When I first received this top I thought that it may be too small, but it stretches a lot and I could see it fitting someone who is a medium/large. The only thing though is that the elastic does get uncomfortable after wearing it all day, but I mean like morning to night all day, not just a couple of hours. Also, the padding in the bra is removable, which might make it more comfortable, but I haven't tried it without the padding yet. This top is also a lot more conservative then some of the same style. The neck line goes up higher then I expected and the shoulder straps are thicker then my other one. This gives the top really good support, and although I wouldn't trust it working out or hiking, for day to day use this is perfect and reliable. For reference, Im about 5'1 and 110 pounds.
*I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review

This top is super cute and would totally work well with crop tops and open back shirts.  I am a 34A and this fits really well.  It isn't too tight around the rib cage and provides some-minimal support.  It feels similiar to a loose sports bra.  One thing that keeps this product from getting 5 stars is that fact that the back of the bralette is elastic bands instead of cotton.  The pictures make it look like it is stiched well however they are more like elastic then cotton.  The only reason that I bought this in comparison to Brandy Melville is the fact that it is padded and I hope it wouldn't make my chest look too flat.  Which it didnt. :).  If you have a larger chest I would greatly suggest going to Brandy Melville or brandymelville.com and looking at their version of the product instead.  Overall if you have a small chest I would recommend this item.

So I purchased this knowing it was going to be too small. I'm a 38D and I'm still nursing my newborn BUT some part of me hoped it would somehow fit.

The bra itself stretches pretty well not too tight and definitely no room for sagging. The back of the bra offers up some great support so that's a plus. The fabric itself is not great. About something you'd expect to buy at Forever 21.

The front where the cups are--small. They covered about half of my breast. The padding DOES come out! Top right and left corner of the inside of the bra is where you can remove and insert the padding.

 I personally prefer no padding. I really do love this bra. This would go perfect underneath a large shirt. The design is super cute. In another life where I'm not big chested and nursing I'd wear this all the the time. In any case, it'll be a cute gift for my sister.

***Please rate my review as "Helpful" if it helped you because it helps me too! :) Thanks! I received this product at a discount/free in exchange for an honest & unbiased review. My opinions are my own and were not influenced by the seller.***

This is a cute bracelet and the charms are not cheap -- they have plenty of weight to them.

Note that it is a bit bigger than you might think. For someone with a very thin wrist, as shown in my pictures, this is a bit too big. In fact, the picture that makes the bracelet look like it fits actually was taken of the item on the UPPER arm! Yes, this is rather large in diameter, so would fit someone with somewhat larger wrists.

This is definitely NOT sterling silver or even silver plated but it's a cute, cheap necklace that looks pricier and is fun to wear. I love jewelry and have so much from very inexpensive to very expensive and I feel less nervous when I wear my cheap jewelry because, if it gets lost, I am not out ,much money. So when I do casual or active things, I throw on costume jewelry. This necklace was already complimented at a grocery store by a complete stranger. I told her it was under $2.00 and she thought I was lying.

This ships from China and takes a while to get here but it came much sooner than anticipated. I gave it 4 stars not because it is super high quality but because it is better quality than expected for the very low price.
summary: Looks just like the photo. Well worth $2.00!

reviewText: I purchased this bag as a birthday gift to myself. It did take about 2 weeks to arrive, but was well worth the wait! At first I couldn't find the long strap. I was so disappointed. I contacted the seller and they replied back within a few hours and said they would be happy to send a strap and was sorry for any inconvenience. Well my husband found the strap, it was inside the middle zipper pocket, I quickly shot a email to the seller to let them know. Would buy again! Good Quality and great price!

This is an absolutely gorgeous purse, inside and out, and yes, it IS real leather.  It is nicely sized and I really love the super sized zippered middle compartment that now hold my super fat wallet and two electronic chargers for my cell phone and Kindle (which is also carried inside the purse).  The stitching is very well done, and the leather is soft and supple and has a soft, classy sheen.  I wanted this as a shoulder bag and thought I wouldn't like the handles, but I've found that the handles make it much easier to open the purse and don't detract from the purses looks at all.  Since this purse is fashionably understated, it can go with everything I have from casual to just short of full formal, which makes this a super-plus for me...and, since it is such a unique bag, I won't be seeing it coming and going off everyone's arm. (Also, I know from experience that bags can be 'switched' so I'm inclined to think that the unhappy owners of this purse got one of the 'bait and switches' rather than the true Heshe... this is my second Heshe product and love them both).
summary: A stunning purse more than worth the money,

Great first baseball cap.

The visor is proportionally as long as normal adult baseball caps are, which is wonderful for dressing baby up to look like Dad and/or an NCIS agent, and it provides the best protection from the sun to precious little eyes. The one downside to that visor length is it invites the baby's flailing arms or swiveling head to knock the whole hat right off. But I still like it! Just understand usage scenarios: don't strap baby onto you facing TOWARDS you, and always be ready for little hands to pop the thing off at any random time (i.e. be ready to pick it up off the ground (i.e. no Lion King / Circle-of-Life holds while standing over a cliff, on a ship's bow, or riding a roller-coaster...but don't do any of those things anyway!!!)) Use it for what it's best at doing: this hat definitely takes the two prizes 1) for making baby look like a tiny adult, and 2) for maximizing protection from the sun to protect baby from UV...while it's still on the baby's head, at least! If you're looking for a hat with a more balanced visor (shorter and less rigid) that helps protect little eyes while allowing the hat to stay on longer, I highly recommend https://www.amazon.com/dp/B06XCY2H1B intead...but still keep baby off roller-coasters :-)

This Multi-Color Wood Beaded Jewelry Set by SmitCo LLC. is Adorable!
The Necklace I received offers 72 - 1/8" Rounded Beads in Orange, Green, Dark Pink, Red, Yellow and Light Pink, 6 - 1/2" Elliptical Beads in Red, Blue, Orange and Light Pink and a 1" Hand-painted Light Pink Flower. (Flower Color May Vary As Stated In Product Description)
The Accompanying  Bracelet I received features 28 - 1/8" Rounded Beads in the same colors as the necklace as well as 3 - 1/2" Elliptical beads in Red, Blue and Orange.
The Beads in Both Pieces are strung on a Heavy Duty Elastic Cord.
The  non-stretched measurement on the bracelet is 2" and the necklace is 5 1/2"  before stretching, however the elastic is able to stretch quite a bit.
My order arrived promptly and was packaged in a very nice Ready to Gift Box.
PLEASE NOTE: Although the elastic is very strong on these pieces, I would Not Recommend this for children under 3 yrs of age or  a child with a tendency to put things in their mouths due to choking hazard should they somehow manage to break the elastic cord.
I received this Multi-Color Wood Beaded Jewelry Set in exchange for testing and review and am pleased to give it a Well Deserved 5 Star Recommendation.

Do this if you are interested in this suit: get a tape measure and measure your torso from between your boobs to the front of your crotch. I won't go through that much effort as I expect it would probably cost the same or more than the cost of the swimsuit, putting me at a greater loss. reviewText: Just got the unit a week or so ago. so far it is working very well and above all silently. TPD is widely used by automatic winding watch manufacturers and collectors. Other than that I think the unit is very nicely finiched and presented, fits beautifully with any decore. I recommend it especially if they improve the instruction leaflet.

reviewText:
Just like those missing socks you'll never find again--no matter how hard you look--it's almost impossible to keep a matching set of earring backs. Somehow I found myself with lots of beautiful earings, but no earring backs with which to keep them in place. This age-old dilemma is what set me on my quest to find the perfect pair of reliable earring backs that would fit any--or most--earrings. I first bought some earring backs that made the lofty claim that they would fit any pair of earrings, and were much cheaper, while purporting to do exactly what I needed: fit any pair of earrings without turning my ear green in the process with cheap, sliver-plating. But you get what you pay for, so, not only did my ear end up resembling Kermit the Frog's, I also lost an earring when the "universal" earring back slid right off my favorite turquoise earrings. So I decided to search a little harder on Amazon, read more reviews, and come to terms with paying more for something that seems so small and non-essential (to me, anyway). And I am so, so very happy I did!!! The "World's Most Secure Earring Backs" are just that--incredibly secure and reliable!! They have not hurt my sensitive ears, and I'm allergic to most metals (I swear I'm not just saying that--I am!). More importantly, they somehow manage to firmly stay put on any pair of earrings that I wear.

I don't claim to understand how the technology works, but I do understand that these are the last replacement earring backs I will ever have to buy!!! Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money to get these earring backs that will treat your ears right and will allow you to wear all your orphaned, backless earrings again.
summary: These Really Are Insanely Secure Earring Backs!!!

reviewText: I have tried other "secure" earring backs and none have stayed put as well as these. They do not budge and I have never felt more confident that my earrings are secure. Definitely a worthy investment.
summary: I have tried other "secure" earring backs and none have ...

reviewText:
So glad that I didn't listen to the negative reviews. I was going back and forth on whether or not to get this dress because of the mixed reviews. I am 5'4, 150 lbs, my measurements are waist: 34, bust 36 and hips: 41, I usually wear a 12 petite in most jeans and an 8 in dresses. I ordered the large. I have pretty big shoulders so was afraid it would be tight but it was not. I almost ordered an xtra large because of the reviews saying it is small that was not my experience. I could have likely fit in the medium but the large gives just the right amount of room without being skin tight. I will wear a slip or spandex under this, I am in pretty good shape but likely this dress would show pantie lines. The fabric is soft, and sturdy and it is perfect for the tea party bridal shower I'll be attending. I'm very excited. I will post a photo after the party which is over the weekend.

Update: Photo Attached

The dress is pretty. I typically wear a 9/10 (large), I bought a large and it fits a little loose. It fits, but not as snug as it does on the picture. I could have gotten a medium if I wanted the dress to be a little more fitting.

reviewText:
Absolutely adorable for the price and fast shipping!  Please be aware that this bralette is made for smallers boobs. It fits me great, im 5'3, shirt size is medium and my bra size is 34B.
The padding is somewhat small and had to be unfolded and worked into place but it wasn't difficult. Overall this is definitely worth the price! I just ordered another one!

I bought this as an alternative to a different style I was considering from an online store, however I couldn't stomach spending $27 (including shipping) on a bralette. I ordered this with free Amazon Prime shipping and had it in 2 days for a fraction of the cost. Overall the bralette looks wonderful. The included pads need to be adjusted after you put it on to "support" your chest properly, however I wear a size A bra (or small B) and this works perfectly. I am 5'5", weigh 110 lbs and wear a small/extra small in clothing. I do not think I would recommend this to ladies with larger chests or those who wear larger sizes considering this is one size - this fits snug for me and there isn't a lot of extra room. Also, straps are a bit thinner than depicted in the images but it is definitely cute.

It's pretty much what I expected for the price, however the "padding" is too small to be considered as such, in my opinion. And I don't mean thickness, I mean circumference and diameter. The floating pads just kind of hang out somewhere inside and are very obviously present when the bralette is worn. I just cut a small hole and pulled them out and it looks exponentially better. Also, since these are the same pictures used by every reseller here on Amazon, it's not too clear what you're getting so be forewarned that the back straps are just actual thick(ish) elastic bands. There's no cotton or material covering it and they WILL indent into your back a bit if you have any meat to speak of there. Again, I still like it but this is the info I would have liked to have known before purchasing.
summary: It's pretty much what I expected for the price

reviewText: All things considered, this is a decent bralette -- especially for the price. I weigh 130lbs and wear a 32D bra, and this fits fine. It offers zero support for physical activity, but for doing errands or lounging it's just fine. There are removable cups that pretty much just shape your boobs, although if you're wearing this as a top by itself you can probably see the edges of the inserts. I find it perfect for wearing under tanks and loose/backless tops. I like that it doesn't cut very low in the front so it feels appropriate for layering. One thing to note -- the horizontal straps in the back are attached by a single stitch to the vertical straps, so they don't always lay perfectly flat as they sort of bunch/flip up. It's not terribly noticeable to me. Overall, I think they're a bargain and bought a couple for the summer time.
summary: You get what you pay for

This is NOT an actual review but an observation after reading the other reviews. Why, I wondered, do they differ so much in the description of the fit?  After carefully looking at each photo description provided by the seller, I realized that this item is actually two different styles: one with a free flowing bottom and one with a cinched, elasticized bottom. The one with sequins and an abstract/lace pattern on the edge is the one that's loose on the bottom.  The ones with the trees, cats, etc., have a different bottom edge--it's elasticized at the sides.

The hands of the models hide the cinching, but the closeups of the hems and rear shots do show it.  This helped me determine that cut of the the pattern that I like would not look flattering on me.  Thank you all for your diligence in reviewing and for providing photos..

I hope Amazon allows this to remain up, even though I did not purchase the item.  It's adorable and sounds very comfy from the reviews.
summary: This item is actually two different tops: choose carefully for best fit

reviewText:
The large amount of return instructions inside this dress irritated me from the moment I opened the package. I ordered this through Amazon so that is how I'm returning it. The seller wants you to jump through hoops and call their customer service within 7 days or you can't return this. Just an FYI as I think that is important. Read the instructions just in care you order direct from the seller!
The dress itself is a thick stretch material. I ordered white and it was not see through at all. I am 5'10 and 122 lbs so the small fit but was really snug. The construction of this dress is way off for a normal female torso. As others have said, the straps are too tight and short and the bust comes up way too high on the chest but also has no room to fit a large bust. I am a 34b and it actually was baggy up top if I bent over but also too high on my chest to see cleavage and the straps needed to be two inches longer the material is like tight, thick hard bandage that could abrade your skin if it rubbed under your arms all night. Very weird cut. The back seam and side seams were also not straight. I kept adjusting thinking I may have the dress twisted but it was the dress, not my body that was not straight. I hope the return goes smoothly!
summary: Awkward construction, especially in the bust

reviewText:
This Bracelet is so pretty! Originally when purchasing this bracelet I was not sure that it was going to be very high quality. To be honest I assumed it would be just another piece of costume jewelry to add to my ever growing collection. I was WAY wrong with that assumption.
This bracelet is very heavy and well made metal and the cubic zirconia is very clear and beautiful. The clasp is very thick and holds very tightly which is great because you don't have to worry about it falling off every time you move your wrist. I have a very small wrist and this bracelet is a little bit big which means it might be a bit tight for someone with larger wrists. The heart shape design is very nice while the cubic zirconia is not heart shaped itself you cannot tell unless you are looking very closely.
i cannot stress enough the weight of this piece, it is truly very heavy and well made. I was able to try this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. i was in no way swayed by the price I paid for this item to write this review. It truly is a quality piece of jewelry.

The pictures above do not do this bracelet justice. The sapphire colored cubic zirconia gems are WAY darker. This bracelet has a delicate look to it with each cluster having the dark blue center gem with a number of clear ones surrounding it. Each of the gems is "clawed" in, set similar to a ring. There are 22 clusters on this 6 7/8" length bracelet with an extra cluster and clasp enclosed for extra length if required. Each cluster is approximately 1/4" in diameter.

How easy is it to get on? This bracelet is a little tougher than some to get on but I can manage it by myself without assistance. The bracelet is presented in a quality gift box and once opened you will find the bracelet in a sealed plastic bag inside.

Mine came with a FREE, very pretty silk-like scarf (approximately 18" x 19") included in a separate box in the sealed package. The coloring of the scarf is mostly reds and greens on a white background - floral pattern.

PLEASE remember this is fashion jewelry. Although silver/white gold in color, it is actually only white gold plated alloy. If you are looking for something a little different, dainty but with some color then this could well be the bracelet for you! Product was received in exchange for an honest review. Thanks, Liz
summary: ~~ Dainty clusters of dark 'sapphire' and clear gems ~~

reviewText:
The problem with a lot of the reviews for this bracelet is that they focus on how "sparkly," or "shiny" it is.  Unfortunately, that's not very helpful or descriptive.  Of course it's shiny and sparkly....that's it's job.  What people really need to know is whether there is some characteristic that makes it difficult  or unenjoyable to wear.  So what I wish someone had made clear to me is how large this bangle is, because it's too large to be comfortable to wear, in my opinion.

The circumference of bracelet is 8 inches.  Unfortunately, the circumference of my wrist is less than 6 inches, and the size difference makes the bracelet seem clunky and ungraceful on my arm.  I suppose your mileage may vary based on how large your wrist is, and the aspect ratio of it.  In my case, I have slender wrists that also happen to be quite flat, but this bangle is almost as high as it is wide, which means that it stands quite far off my wrist, and gets in the way when I try to type.

If you're just judging the bracelet on looks, it's nice-looking, but not mind-blowing.  The channel set cubic zirconia do NOT have a lot of fire, so the reflected light is mostly white.  That tells me that they've used okay, but not great, quality CZs.  The bracelet doesn't look particularly real--so you can tell from a mile away that it's a piece of average quality costume jewelry.  To put it in perspective, I'd be okay wearing this with jeans, perhaps, but it's DEFINITELY not something that I would want to wear for a special occasion or gala event.  It's like.....prom jewelry: not very realistic, but fine if you want to glam things up a little.

I'm sure many people will disagree with me---so if this bracelet floats your boat...great. Enjoy it.  But I'd rather read a review that gave me blunt details I can use, rather than overly effusive praise.

---I accepted a sale price on this bracelet in exchange for evaluation and objective review, but it doesn't look anywhere near as good as I'd hoped, and I'm sending it back to Amazon.---

This is an absolutely beautiful bracelet. I've always wanted a tennis bracelet and am so thrilled with this one. I have been wearing it everywhere since It arrived and over and over I've been complimented on its beauty. There is nothing cheap looking about it. It's one of those pieces of jewelry that looks good with  a gown but looks just as good with jeans and a sweatshirt.

It's very heavy.  The bracelet is 19k plated white gold. The bracelet consists of 28 hearts that lies flat against your wrist with a round Cubic Zirconia in the middle of each heart. It fastens securely with a lobster claw clasp. One detail that really stands out  is that the word "love" in engraved on the clasp.  It's such a nice touch.

The bracelet really sparkles. I tried to capture it in the pictures but I feel like that as pretty as it looks in pictures, it pales in comparison to what it looks like in real life.

Received my handbag  yesterday,  unpacked it and  using it today. Its beautiful. Things are well organized. Its just the right size for me and I don't have to fish around to find things. It arrived well packed so the handbag didn't lose its shape or get damaged.  Its not too big and can accommodate a kindle and a small tablet I'm very happy with my purchase.

I have been so disappointed in the quality of purses in the past, I was hesitant to order one, but I did.  And I'm glad I did.  This is a sturdy leather purse with heavy duty zippers and two large compartments big enough to hold my BIG old leather wallet and diabetes test kit (with insulin and supplies).  These compartments are separated by a zipper compartment that holds my new iPhone (the large one) comfortable, easy to put away and get out when I need it.  There are also two pockets on the inside front (one will hold the small iPhone) and a zipper pocket on the inside back.  On the outside are two zipper compartments, front and back, again with the sturdy zippers.  I love this purse and will purchase another color in the near future.  You will enjoy this purse, too.

NOTE:  I have purchased two more purses like this, one for a friend and one for myself, and love them.  Can't go wrong with this purse!

NOTE:  Almost a year later and my black and brown purse in this style still going strong.  Not even a mark on the bottom.  Excellent quality, highly recommended.

July 20, 2015,

reviewText: I ordered two pairs:  A size 30 for me (female, 27" waist, 37" hips) and a size 36 for my boyfriend (36-inch waist).  They fit snugly in places (my hips and upper thighs because they're designed for guys, duh), but not painfully so.  They have been washed (cold water, hang dry) and worn twice and they seem to be holding up very well.  We like them a lot.  The only thing that really bothers me is the fly zipper.  It's metal and seems sturdy so far, but it's somewhat difficult to open and close.  The pull tab is pretty small; I have to dig around for it to zip it up.  I will have to add some sort of charm dongle (witness me!) that hopefully won't encourage "diving flies".  FYI, the other zippers (on the pockets) are plastic but, like the other hardware (snaps, buckles), they also seem sturdy enough so far.

I have seen a guy with the same color combo recently, but his cost close to a couple hundred because they were authentic (RB) make. We traded for a comfort check; neither of us noticed a difference.
The only reason I'm not giving a full 5-stars is because the lenses are way too dark to see well, unless you're in full sunlight. I have to remove them to see anything inside my car. Very dark lenses definitely have their time and place though.

The product photo was somewhat misleading. Although the title clearly says "Mirror Lens," I somehow missed that, going by the photo itself, which clearly shows what appear to be dark lenses. Yet the ones I received were very shiny/mirror-like, which just isn't what I was looking for (and is why I will be returning them).  However, if you're indeed looking for mirror lenses, then rest assured that the photo does not do the true shiny mirrory-ness due justice.
summary: Lenses provide more of a reflective "Mirror" effect than the product photo appears to show.

Beautiful dress, definitely received compliments but once I saw the thin material on me I knew my body would shake/jiggle more than I'd like when walking I use a nude seamless girdle.
Not the ones that typically advertise as seamless and still cut into your skin somehow, THIS one:
The Self Expressions Body Con High Waist Boyshort Panty 00236 sold by Amazon for 12.60 in black and nude (this dress and light colors like it need nude) Sides are 13-1/2" tall. Self Expressions Body Con High Waist Boyshort Panty (00236) M/Black https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00FEC6SL4/ref=cm_sw_r_awd_JoMiwbP0M95V7

PRESENTLY: I weigh 156lbs at 9 mos pregnancy (4'11", 137lbs; size 6 hourglass shape figure pre pregnancy) --a size 6-8 in pants during pregnancy & small/medium in pregnancy clothing.

 Girdle is not pregnancy gear I can no longer fit the medium. I give as much info to help others determine if this will be good for them. The medium up to 151lbs fit me snugly a little too snug but not choking. Length for the boy short on my core covered my hole belly so under the dress I had no jiggle in the front from my mommy pouch (3rd child) or jiggle from the backside.

For my weight/height body frame, the size "small" in the boy short fit my weight range during this pregnancy: 137-147lbs my medium days: 147-150lbs (please consider I've been pregnant so my belly is more sensitive at this weight, you may have more 'give' and fit into a medium up to 154lbs.

Get the girdle and the dress so you can walk freely. Nothing prettier than a beautiful dress on a woman who feels confident and COMFORTABLE. And I'm alllllll for comfort.
summary: Very nice, used with a girdle, see link below

reviewText: Ok, the cincher is suppossed to be tight. It's pretty comfortable for what it is/designed to do (I lasted 6 hours on my first day before it became painful). Also, I don't know what everyone is talking about with it "running small" (I don't think people realize it's supossed to be really snug against the body?). I have an ever-so-slightly above 31 inch waist (like 31 and quarter or so). I ordered large and had to use the second hooks on the very first day.

The ribbon seam broke immediately, just after trying it on.
The cincher itself is a bit long...and I don't have a short torso. So, when wearing a dress, you can see the cincher sitting on my butt. When I lifted it a little higher, I swore I thought it was going to puncture my boobs. It's just too long.

The hold and the shape I get is good (it really does hold in my stomach and give me an hour-glass shape) but there is just too much hassle with this cincher.

Fun underwear, and they fit well. It's hard to tell about the fit from all the pictures available, with the guy always covering his junk so it's showing how fitting the underwear would be if your hand was in your underwear? Haha, but it's necessary of course because your junk is so darn visible through the mesh. It's so nice to venture into a realm of underwear for play and not for utility, although the breathability of the mesh makes me feel like I'd wear it to work (especially because it gives that 'undercover bad boy' kind of feel that I think I need to get through the boring days). The stitching line in front can be distracting, as in, your junk should be the main focus but what you see is this line down the center. It's whatever, though. The stitching line in the back, however, is nice because it pulls the underwear in a bit between the cheeks, which adds to the separation and definition of your two halves (i.e. it makes your butt look nice). The waist and leg bands have a good feel to them , of a reasonably good quality for the price point. I'd recommend these to people looking for a nice pair of basic fun underwear, just expect to wait for them for like a month if you're ordering in the U.S. Of course, the Asian measurements are bit small, so order up a size. I normally wear size small (with a waist of 30~31), and the mediums fit well for me.

This is a very nice, albeit large, watch and pedometer. I've owned several pedometers over the past few years, and if you're used to all the bells, whistles, and customization that's available in higher-end models, you're not going to be very happy with the basic odometer in this watch. If you are just looking for a basic pedometer/watch combination that is very affordable and very well made, then this should fit the bill.

Steps are only recorded while in pedometer mode, and these are only displayed as steps. There's no conversion to distance. The reason for this is that there's no way to adjust or customize your stride length. You have to remember to turn on pedometer mode when walking or running, or your steps will not be recorded.

The watch face is approximately 1.75", the display area being just over 1 inch of that. This means you have a very large and easily readable display. There are four different buttons positioned around the watch. One just turns the light on and off (only the numbers glow, not the entire watch face.) The mode button controls pedometer mode, display mode, and allows you to take your pulse.

The remaining two buttons allow you to select options while in the various modes, as well as adjust time and so on. You can also review the memory and display how many steps were recorded. When displaying your recorded steps the watch alternates between steps, calories, and kilometers. The kilometers is only a guess, as there is no way to set your stride length.

For basic pedometer, and a full-featured watch, this is a great bargain. Especially since it is water resistant past 100'  although I have not tested that part out. Free sample provided for honest review.
summary: A basic pedometer and full-featured watch in a large water resistant package.

reviewText:
This is an excellent replacement for my Pebble (original model) that used to have the silicone band. It fits the watch width (22mm) perfectly and is plenty long enough for my large wrist. It's a little stiff when first installed, but within a day or two of wearing it, the band shaped itself and is now very comfortable.

It has 5 metal loops on it, which give it a more rugged look, and hold the excess band beyond the buckle so it doesn't snag on anything. The black coating on the loops begins to wear off after a while, but I use mine in a somewhat rough environment, so it find it acceptable that they develop a bit of patina. They are certainly strong and well made. There are two of these loops at the end of the NATO part that goes under the watch, one of which seems redundant, but I think that is a styling decision. It certainly works as designed.

Having almost lost the watch when the original silicone band broke, I am very pleased with the design that won't allow the watch to come off your wrist if it slips a retaining pin. As for the band ever actually "breaking" I cannot imagine that, as it is tightly woven high quality nylon, similar to a miniature seat belt.
summary: Excellent for my original Pebble watch

reviewText:
These are 90% awesome!!! It hits all the right necessities for a breastfeeding mom. It's perfect to wear around the house and very comfortable unlike a regular bra. Plus it's two in one shirt plus bra. You probably wouldn't want to wear it out by itself but you absolutely could. It's perfect for wearing under sheer or flowy tops. I like it comfortable, flattering, easy to open and close for feeding with just one hand, nice and long for if you are pregnant, & the straps are adjustable and detachable so you can wear it criss cross in the back for racer back shirts. The only thing that really sucks is when you wash them the breast padding comes apart a little bit. They are still functional but once they come apart, first wash, they make your boobs look a little lumpy. You can always put different ones in but the ones they come with are really perfect shape and thickness. Bummer.
Also Beware they run a little small just order one size up. It's really just around the chest that's semi small but it cuts into your back a little.

Shipping is pretty fast considering it comes from china. i think it takes less than one week. the fabric is really soft, good quality, elastic, however, to my surprise, not at all tight like a full body swimming suit. it definitely looks too small for me before i wear it. it also is shorter than the picture. cuts right above the hip. the bra support is great too with the pad inside. before pregnant, i was always size S, however, these tanks are size L and its the right size. price is also pretty low.

reviewText:
When these arrived they were separately packaged and labeled. Also, the quality is pretty good! You know some Victoria Secret label underwear - wears thin after a couple of months and loses it's elasticity. The benefit of these panties is that their shape is not reliant on elasticity, and won't start getting huge or misshaped after a few washes. The only concern I would have is whether the color will hold up without fading, but for the price and quality, I think that is not a huge determiner as to whether they are worth the buy. Also.....
They fit me so well! I am 5'5'' with a slender frame (athletic slender if that makes sense). I do not have the typical skinny girl body as my bottom part of my body usually is considered large including my legs (If I size up undergarments to fit my backside then I find the rest of the clothing item doesn't fit my actual frame). Also, they fit me like cheeky panties, which I do not mind as they fit my actual body structure and the panties are just so comfortable! I am tempted to buy more of these right now, but have only used them for two weeks so I want to see how the upkeep goes. I'll update if anything new comes up. :)

Pros:
+ rayon fabric means superior softness without synthetic feel
+ lovely drape and movement in the skirt
+ fold over waist means variable length, waist styles
+ softer and wears well over time (no pilling after many washes)
+ holds color and doesn't fade with repeated washings

Cons:
- dries slower than other garments
- air dry is best or low heat tumble but beware of misshaping
- single layer of fabric so you may need slip or additional layers (many colors available!)

reviewText: Love this comfortable basic skirt. I will wear it all summer with a tank top. Fits me a bit snug around the waist, but the large elastic fold over part feels supportive on stomach and back. I am age 45, 5'2" and 116 lbs, and I got a medium. If you are debating about size, I would size up. However, if you are younger than me, you may not want to size up. I like my clothing a bit loose and comfortable. It hits me right at knee length. I may not even fold over the elastic waist for a longer length. Glad I purchased this skirt. I've been looking for a basic skirt like this for a long time.
Great material and perfect length!  It also holds in the love handles :)

I love these skirts!  I have purchased a number of them in various colors, and they have become a major anchor to my wardrobe.  They're casual enough that I can run weekend errands in them, stylish enough to wear when I'm at work, comfortable enough for me to wear when traveling by air, and compact enough to pack in either my carry-on or checked luggage.  I also appreciate the foldover waist, as I'm one of these people whose stomach area expands and shrinks based on how recently I've had a meal, making many pants or skirts that have a zipper closure difficult to wear:  they can go from being a little too loose to uncomfortably tight within the same day.  Not a problem with these skirts!  And it's fun to wear on top of that - has a nice weight and movement as I walk.  Size-wise, I'm 5'5" and around 105 and find the medium to be my best choice for fit.  I've attached a photo of me wearing the skirt - that white spot is not on the skirt, rather it seems to have been a "blip" on the photo.
summary: Versatile, Stylish and Comfortable:  An inexpensive and fun way to maintain a feminine look to my wardrobe!

reviewText: I am 5'3' and about 150 lbs. I am rather pear shaped and the medium I bought was almost on the too small side. I would suggest going up a size from what you would normally order. What the picture doesn't show is that the top is very form fitting and tight. If you are uncomfortable with that and just want the skirt to fall around you, don't get this item. It's also very lightweight. I can see right through it and always need a slip under it. This would make it very nice for summer and warmer weather as it is very swishy at the bottom. I bought it for a Halloween costume but will probably wear it this summer with a longer shirt to help cover the top part of the skirt.
Really not good quality... I don't recommend this at all.

I am pregnant an was looking for a good stretchy skirt to wear and I noticed that when you don't fold over the top this looks like a lot of pregnancy skirts. Seeing another buyer my height (and from look in picture around my size) was happy with a medium wile pregnant I order the same size. I was nervous when it came because the waist looked so small when I pulled it out of the package, but it stretched very nicely and feels very comfortable, as well as looking great! I will probably order another color in large for my third trimester. Will have to see how much this one continues to stretch, but what's great about it is I think it's one of the few things I bought to wear wile pregnant that I can wear again once I lose baby weight!

reviewText: Although I bought this ages ago and wrote a review about receiving the wrong size I need to relate what happened recently with the skirt.  I gave these two skirts to my niece.  One I had opened and realized it was not 2X but a size 2.  The other was in a sealed plastic bag.  When my niece came and I gave her the opened one and the other one sealed, she opened the unopened one.  The skirt was WET and reeked of ammonia so strongly that it took my breath away!  My niece's eyes watered from the smell emanating from this skirt.  We immediately bagged it and took it to the trash to get it out of the house.  This skirt is made in China not America !

After I wore it a day, I noticed that one side of the hem was a little off but I thought it was just me. After removing it and taking a closer look - I realized the hemline was poorly cut and it was not straight at all. I didn't return it as it fits the bill for what I purchased it for - something really comfortable to wear around the house after surgery (really comfortable waistband) but I can't give a 5-star review as the hemline is really wonky and crooked. It's unfortunate that I can't wear it out later. The charcoal color is nice and material is soft. Just really poorly cut.
summary: Great fabric and comfortable waistband - but hemline was really crooked

I never have luck ordering from China because the quality is so poor and things run very, very small, so I vowed to never order clothes from China off of Amazon again. reviewText: Soft material and fits great!

Wore this skirt for multiple days in Central America.
It takes up little space. I kept it in my carryon to change into after our flights and it took very little space.
It never looked wrinkled.
Water that dripped on it dried quickly.
The skirt is flowy enough to allow a breeze to cool off your legs. It is also flowy enough to fly up in gusty winds; I mooned a lagoon during a photo op on a mountain ridge!
I also wore the skirt to keep me modest during a roadside bio-break. I managed to squat next to our van, scooch down my drawers to my knees, and keep the skirt held like a curtain around my nethers while I relieved my bladder. To me, that's high praise for a travel skirt!
I got the charcoal grey, which was not see-through at all. A lighter color might be, so be sure to order it in enough time to test it.
I wear 8 in dresses, 10 in pants. I ordered the large and it fit comfortably loose without being in danger of falling off. I could probably have gotten the medium; it would have been more snug on my waist.
I am 5'11" and this skirt fell at my knee without being too short when I sat (a rarity for my height).
summary: Wonderful travel skirt, especially for the price

reviewText: This runs small and is made from VERY thin material. It does NOT cover my knees when the waistband is folded over, and I'm average height at 5'5", but I cannot wear it unfolded as it's far too tight at the waist. In the navy color it's really a darker blue but not one that I would call navy, it does not appear to be see through, and a bonus the fullness seems to hide panty lines, despite how thin the fabric is. I typically wear a 10/12 in pants and the Large in this fits snugly, I may try an XL if it might fit allowing the waist to be unfolded.

This review is for the Qianse Hoop Earrings with Austrian Crystals Fashion Weeding Jewelry.

These are stunning 2 inch hoop earrings. I have some standard hoop earrings but I wanted something with sparkle. It is actually fairly hard to find something with sparkle in the 2 inch hoop size. I am glad I found these.

These earrings are SUPER COMFORTABLE on. The backs have the loop closure, you slide them through the holes on your ears into the loop on the back. Then you pinch them closed and they are sort of clip style on the back of pierced ears. I actually really like this style of closure as its easy to put on and take off, taking me less than 3 seconds per ear to get them in. I also don't need a mirror to put them in which is nice.

The hoops are stunning plated white gold with an alloy base. I find they DO NOT irritate my ears and are very comfortable to wear for extended periods. The white gold SHINES and looks STUNNING. There is no color changing of the metal or itching. My earring holes are very sensitive and I can wear these with ease.

The crystals go around the whole outer perimeter of the hoops. They are slightly faceted and hit the light beautifully. Major wow-factor. I get a lot of compliments. Great dressy hoops for going out at night. 5/5 stars!

If you have any questions please post below and I would be happy to answer! I received a free promotional sample of this item for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: The nicest hoop earrings I own!

reviewText: Beautiful bracelet - very heavy and well made.

After checking other reviews, I examined this bracelet carefully for any flaws or defects.
Keeping in mind that this is costume jewelry, as opposed to fine jewelry, it appears to be well made. Unlike others, each stone is even and securely fixed to the metal. They appear to be glued in as oposed to set in.
As the second photo shows, the clasp on the particular bracelet I was sent is in full working order and holds the bracelet on my wrist securely. For reference, it is on a 7.5 wrist.
For costume jewelry, it has a nice feel and look. It arrived in the classic hinged and padded presentation box, lined in a velvety fabric as shown.
I can only suspect that this relatively new vendor had a batch go out that was not subject to quality control, and any defective bracelet will be refunded or replaced .

Product received to test with the option to review. No financial compensation is EVER accepted, and vendor may request that item be returned. Views and opinions are my own.

This multi-colored, crystal, tennis bracelet from QIANSE features 17, square-cut, faceted, genuine Swarovski crystals in a white gold plated setting.

This bracelet is thinner and more delicate than it appears on the product page. It's very tailored and elegant looking and the different colored crystals will coordinate with lots of different dresses and tops. It's not jingly and doesn't make any noise when wearing it so it's suitable to wear to work.

It comes in a pretty, white, hinged box with gold stamping on the top and the sides so it's ready for gifting if you choose.

Others mentioned that their bracelet arrived broken. Mine arrived in perfect condition and the clasp closes securely however, another bracelet I have from QIANSE did arrive broken so there may be some quality control issues. I would suggest opening it before gifting so that you can return it if there are any issues.

NOTE: I was given a free sample for review but a positive review was not asked for, promised or implied. Recent changes on Amazon have made it impossible to turn off the Verified Purchase badge as I used to in the past, unfortunately.
summary: Goes with practically every outfit I own

reviewText:
I love this jewelry set. it pairs perfectly with any black dress or outfit. I also like to wear it with a nice neutral colored sweater and with every outfit I have tried it with it matches perfectly.

The chain on this necklace is very thin and dainty which generally I don't like as I like to wear pieces that can take a lot of wear  and tear. I think if this chain was any thicker it would make this piece a little too thick for my liking. The clasp is a very well made thick lobster claw type clasp that seems to hold up very well to my busy lifestyle.

The slide on this necklace is really the centerpiece for this set and it accents really very well. The purple stone is so beautiful and reminiscent of a purple piece of ice. The Swarovski elements add just the right amount of sparkle without over shining the stone. Both pieces of the necklace are very well made and offset each other nicely.

The earrings in this set are very sturdy. They have a hook shaped back that does not require a backing to keep these earrings one which I find very useful because I hate looking for lost earring backs. The stones match the stone on the necklace perfectly and though I do wish they were a little smaller so that I could show off the necklace a little more I still really do love them.

I was able to try this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Crystal drop earrings and matching necklace make this a very beautiful set. The elegant link chain is 16" which can be elongated by up to an additional 2" if you wish by the extra chain piece on the end of the chain.

Important to remember that this is only fashion jewelry which is, of course, reflected in the price. HOWEVER I have reviewed many, many items of jewelry and Qianse produces some of the best. Each piece is packaged in a plastic bag inside a pretty gift box so you can be assured that what you purchase has been well protected during shipping.

Would I recommend this to others? Yes! Product provided in exchange for an honest review. Thanks, Liz

I received this sample at discount in exchange for this review.  This is a beautiful bangle bracelet.  First off, the center CZ crystal is huge---I measured approximately 3/8 inch (8mm) edge to edge.  The channel mounted cz-are smaller, about 1/8 (3mm) edge to edge, so that the width of the bracelet is about 3/16 (4-5mm) wide.  The picture (amazon picture) does not do it justice as its much more beautiful when you actually see it.  The center stone, is surrounded on both sides by (I counted) 40 smaller stones (20 on each side).  All of the stones in this bracelet are princess cut--and are very sparkly.  The metal is a hypoallergenic base metal, that is rose colored and very shiny.  The snap lock clasp is very secure and closes flat--so it won't pinch or be uncomfortable in anyway.  I have bought a lot of jewelry and shopped for even more.  I think for the price, the Qianse products are very competitive---and I think based on what I have seen in department stores and Amazon--that for the price you won't find any better.  Its workmanship is superb, and its "heft"---its heavy--, finish, and "eye appeal" are excellent.  Its beautiful!  Take a look at my pics===you can see how they look much better than the amazon pic!  Thank you
summary: My wife LOVES it.  The price--its super competitive, and quality is superb

reviewText: One of the better replica pieces I've seen that wasn't produced directly by Disney and is a reasonable price. The details on the coin are well done, albeit not the thickest (the coin isn't overly thick either). The necklace that it comes on is colored like the coin and made of a chain link with a semi-adjustable clasp. The ring securing the piece around the chain did slip off of it, but nothing a few minutes and a pair of pliers couldn't fix. If you are looking for a coin without the necklace part you could take this off of the chain, however you would still be left with a loop on the coin.
summary: Good For the Price: Not Overly Durable

reviewText:
This really is a beautiful pendant.  It is totally deceptive, does not appear to be a magnifying glass.  However, be aware that it is larger than I had thought it would be from the photos, and rather heavy.  The larger size will actually make it easier for reading, and the weight shows that it is really glass, not a cheap plastic disc, so for some people, these may not be objections at all.  It has a vintage look and will be great with dressier attire, but I had hoped that if a smaller size and less conspicuous, that I could wear it nearly all the time while traveling.  The price was great for such a handy and beautiful pendant so I certainly will find a use for it, though not as I had expected.  The chain is sufficiently long that the magnifying glass is easy to use. Think I'll still look for a smaller pendant for travel.

If you find this review helpful, please let me know by using the voting buttons.  Through the years, I have relied on reviews to make smart purchases and now I'm trying to "pay it forward" by helping others with my reviews.  Please let me know how I'm doing with your vote.  Thanks!!
summary: Vintage look, handy tool, good price

reviewText: I really like these leggings. I am 5'7" and 134 pounds, and I ordered a size small and they fit me without giving me a muffin top. They are stretchy and look great. The length is a little longer than I expected, and aren't as short as they are on the model in the picture. If you're looking for shorter leggings, I would go with the capri version (which I plan to order soon). They hit my midsection in about that same place as the model pictured, but I am VERY long-waisted. The color detail at the top is reasonably thick, sturdy, and high quality. They are very cute with a crop top, but the top detail isn't so thick that you can't wear a longer top over it. All in all, these are fantastic!

reviewText:
I wear a size 43 Vibram FF and the M/L size fits almost perfectly. I was wearing cotton and wool Injinjis before these but those don't last very long.

The Filas are about half the price of the cotton Injinjis and they look more durable. They also wick away sweat better and aren't as soggy after wearing them. Overall I think I prefer the wool Injinjis but they are expensive and don't last very long.

I also have some Angelina toe socks that work fine for walking around that are a lot cheaper than these. I like them both.
These are my favorite socks for my Vibrams. Comfortable and high quality with a good fit.
They are not 'no show' however.
Just what I asked for.
Very comfortable

These socks are labeled as "no show" however they DEFINITELY show.
I have to wear these specific type of socks when working out or doing excessive walking. I was hoping they would be lower so that the FILA label didn't show.

I don't think I would buy these particular glove socks again. They are anatomically incorrect in their design for adults. My outside toes keep coming out. No one's toes are lined up in a row at the top of their foot. Most feet are angled and toes connect to the foot along that angle. These socks are made for feet that have no angle, like a babies foot.
These socks are fine, helps on long walks with a bunion

I like these socks. When I saw such a good deal on them, I had to jump at it.

From the first time I put them on (after being washed) I noticed how soft they are. They aren't thick, but feel sturdy like many running socks. The fit overall is nice. The one thing I don't like so much is the toe size. They are unisex, and this becomes obvious when I put my toes into them. I wear a size 9.5 men's, so my feet aren't that big. It takes actual effort to put them on my toes because of how snugly they fit (which is not the case with my Injinji socks). I predict this is because of the line they had to walk to make them unisex. This is the reason for 4 stars. I feel like adding one more size to the lineup would allow them to adjust both sizes to better fit more people.

Once on they perform beautifully. They keep my feet dry and add no noticeable bulk inside my shoe. My toes are warmly and softly wrapped and separated (something I really appreciate due to chronic ingrown toenails).
They seem built to last about as long as you'd expect an average pair of socks to, so no quality issues to be seen.

Overall, this is a good, fairly inexpensive, pair of socks. Quality, fit, and feel won't be matched until you start paying $8-$10+/pair of socks.
Love them
These socks are not the ones to reach for if you have to dash out of your house, but I still love them!  They're so great for keeping all my toes aligned!

Fila's toe socks provide exactly the right protection for each toe and have completely prevented any further such damage.  I wear them, with a second regular sock inside all my athletic shoes.  They are perfect inside Fila's toe shoes, which also help straighten my hammered toes!!!

** I received this product for a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review
summary: This is really affordable for the "cool" factor

reviewText:
First, I did receive this watch free for the purpose of testing and review. While I recognize that a review of a free product is fundamentally different from that of a product for which one has paid, I do take reviewing seriously, and so I am hopeful that my findings will prove helpful to you in your decision making. If you have questions about the watch, post them in the comments section and I'll do my best to answer based on my own experience with the product.

What you're getting with this order:
(1) Bracelet style watch
(1) set written instructions

What is this watch, and what makes it different from a regular watch?:
This is a bracelet style watch, done in black stainless steel.  The main difference in this watch from others is that there is no visible face when the lights are not activated. In other words, the entire watch looks like a watch band.  However, when a button is pushed to display the time, the letters glow out from the watchband and are easy to see. The watch can be toggled between time (hour and minute), date, and finally seconds. The display is large, taking up most of the dorsal side of your wrist.

Does it work?:
Yes, it works quite well. I've tested the watch and have the following observations to share:

Appearance: The color is somewhere between black and gunmetal grey.  The entire watch, when the display is not activated appears to be bracelet made from a watch band.  It has two prominent buttons on the right side of the watch "face" itself.  These buttons are explained in the instructions that accompany the watch.  They are also listed here in the product description.

Build:  The watch is built from stainless steel and feel quite durable (I've owned it for a month now and have experienced no problems). The weakest point on the watch feels like its clasp as it is light weight and small, but I have yet to have any difficulty with it. Overall, build is solid for a sub $10 watch. The band will be small on larger wearers. I have a medium frame and I use up every last centimeter of this band.

Function: The watch is not easy to set initially.  You have to spend some time with the instructions, and even then it takes a little practice to move through each step.  But once you understand the process, it goes quite smoothly.  Once the watch is set, you just push the top button to see the time and then again to toggle through the other displays. The display itself is quite large and plenty bright, even in broad daylight.

Anything else of note?:As of the posting of this review, the watch is eligible for free shipping to members of Amazon Prime; that's always a check in the plus column for me.

Any negatives?:
-The band itself is not very long, and at 8.35", it may be too short for larger people.
-Clasp mechanism is difficult to manipulate one handed so donning the watch independently is not simple.
-The clasp is very difficult to undo one handed, especially if you wear the watch infrequently and don't remember exactly how it works.
-The faceless design is very unique and not likely to please everybody.  It may be too odd for some.

Bottom line: This is a very interesting design concept that is being offered at the lower end of the budget price range. It displays time and date in a unique manner that is likely to please many younger shoppers who appreciate something modern and new. The build has proven to be sturdy so far and the watch has a moderate ease of use with most difficulty centering around donning/doffing via the tiny clasp.  Being unique and unusual, it is not likely to please users who prefer a more conservative watch style.  Enjoy!

reviewText: Very cute jammys. Nice warm material. Had a problem with the feet being to small, fit everywhere else was true to size.

I returned these because after some research on snug fit vs. looser PJs, I decided to not use PJs that have flame retardant chemicals on them anymore. It is not just the case for these specific PJs, it seems by law all wider-cut PJs have to be flame retardant. If this weren't an issue for me, these are cute, soft and snuggly, and their wider/looser style would have worked fit-wise for my 10-month-old, who we have trouble squeezing into snug fit PJs.

I have since given up finding one-piece PJs that do not have flame retardants and are wider cut (snug fit or flame retardant seems to be the law) and have bought some 2 piece cotton PJs  they are also snug fit, but I found that being able to pull the long sleeve shirt over the head makes it a bit easier to pull the arms through than putting on the one-piece. I like the one-pieces because they don't expose the belly and come with "feet" to keep baby toes warm, but the fit and chemical issues made it impossible for us to find an one-piece PJ that works for our baby.

I would say these PJs run small, because my 10-month-old would have fit in these 18 month size with a small bit of room to grow  however, that seems to be the case for my baby with most other clothes brands as well, so I would say that these also fit like other brands of that size (Carters, Target, Gymboree  most all styles run small on my baby, who is slightly above average height and average weight).
summary: Do not like flame retardant chemicals, run small

Pros:
These are excellent. I have had my son wearing these since he was 10 months old, and have been consistently pleased by the quality and warmth for the price.

Minor con:
They do tend to get less fleecy and more pilled over time, especially if your child isn't changed out of them first thing in the morning and they are being washed every few days. For this reason, I'm not sure they're good for more than one child to use.
They are always a bit too big for a few weeks when you move on to the next size, which doesn't seem to quite correlate with age. You have to get the next size up when  your child's toes start to reach the end of the pajama when stretched out, or your child will have trouble sleeping.

Overall:
We currently have 6 of these that fit him, as he loves them so much. We also like traveling with them - he doesn't get too hot or cold on the plane while wearing them.

I thought I'd repair them and so unpackaged a second pair in order to be able to see the teeny screw but the arm of the second pair came off as soon as I slid the glasses out of their fabric case! It would be comical if it weren't so frustrating. In contrast, all the glasses in the Gamma Ray 4 pack I ordered (at half the price of these) are still going after nearly 2 years of constant use. Though no longer strong enough for me, I'll use those until Amazon delivers their higher magnification equivalent. Matter of fact, I'm wearing them now as I type this. :) Skip these, go for the Gamma Rays if you can find a pair to suit your style. GAMMA RAY 4 Pairs Rectangular Spring Loaded Reading Glasses Sun Readers - 1.50x

reviewText: Nice prices for sturdy reading glasses.

Recent cataract surgery left me in need of reading glasses while waiting for my eyes to heal and stabilize before visiting the optometrist for prescription glasses. These readers were just what I was looking for. They are attractive, sturdy, and fit well. The four piece offering allows me to stash a pair wherever I need them.  TruVision shipped my order very quickly in a sturdy box. ensuring that the glasses arrived without a hint of damage.  This company is first rate and their glasses are superior to anything you can find at the drug store.  In the future, TruVision will be at the top of my list for reading glasses.

These are great glasses. Very stylish and very good quality lens. I highly recommend! The only suggestion is that you may consider to order a pair with one level lower strength than your normal readers.

The customer service is impeccable: right after I received my order, Erin emailed me making sure I received the product and all are in good condition. When I told her couple of days later that one of the pairs has a small defect, she sent me a replacement pair immediately. And she agreed to send a different color with lower strength for me to try.

I will buy this brand again.
summary: These are great glasses. Very stylish and very good quality lens

reviewText:
This is a great little outfit.  I have a somewhat large and tall boy.  He was 9 months when he wore this to my sister's wedding.  We first ordered the 12-18 month size and that was too small.  It fit at around 6.5 months but I knew he'd need a larger size before the wedding. Just before the wedding I ordered the 18-24 month size and it fit on the wedding day with the following exception. The 18 month old size fit but it isn't a very stretchy material so it has an upper limit of size.  That said, the real problem was the snaps for diaper changes.  They easily unsnaped themselves with slight pressure because he was at the edge of the size and they are plastic snaps.  I like the idea of plastic rather than metal snaps but it means if your child is on the upper end of the size, they don't hold very well.  Still he looked wonderful and I'd purchase again.

I don't think the sizing is really off.  Likely my son just grows fast and the material not being stretchy means it's less forgiving than your standard onesie.  Shipping was faster than they said on the 18-24 size and arrived 2 weeks earlier than the 4 week expected time (from China I suspect) which was good because the expected shipping time would have put the outfit arriving the day after my sister's wedding!
summary: Great product with one small flaw

reviewText: Excellent quality

The quality of this skirt is pretty decent except the frills. When opening the package be careful of frill particles falling. It seems it is machine cut for the frill gap look and it doesn't leave clean cuts.

I had to spend 1 hour "dusting" this skirt off so the frill particles have majorly fell off and by the end my bathtub (where I done this) is filled with little skirt particles. I wore this skirt 3 times and every time there is still few of them that managed to escape the previous attempts to come off. I highly recommend a laundry bag when you are washing this skirt so the particles stay in the bag and not all over the rest of your laundry!

As for wear, this skirt is comfortable and looks pretty! So if you are willing to clean this skirt nicely it is worth the purchase.

reviewText: Very nice and great fit.

I ordered these because I am 6'3, 185lbs...athletic build. My normal waist size is anywhere from a 32"-34" depending on the brand. I was attracted to them because of the advertised longer length as I have a problem finding athletic pants that go all the way to my shoe. My normal inseam is a 34". These are WAY OFF. I ordered the Large, and the waist was tight. Don't plan on wearing these without some sort of support briefs or you will be displaying your stuff in HD. I would say the inseam is a 30.5" at best. They didn't come close to my ankles. They also aren't at all loose fitting as the photo shows. They are fairly straight legged. As a frame of reference, my wife who is 5'2 and 115lbs put them on and the waist fit her perfectly. They were only about 4 inches too long.

Pro's: Very lightweight material. Could be very nice!
Con's: The fit is not at all as described. They are made to sit very low on your hips and the waist size and length are way off!
summary: 5" at best. They didn't come close to my ankles

The jeggings are thin and to be honest jeggings are meant to be thin. I prefer them thin because I can wear them during the summer. The stretch is great and that's important for me because I'm a thick female and I had having a hard time when it comes to pulling them up and down. The jeggings tell the the truth so if you have curves they will be visible and if you don't have a shape that will help you look a little bit more thick. I love them and I plan on ordering all the colors. I hope that the seller gets more colors such as cobalt and green. The price is reasonable and the jeggings are comfortable. They are long but I don't mind that because I'm short ('5"2). I weigh 155lbs with thick thighs and a flat stomach, which by the way the jeggings cover my stomach. Its best to wear with some spanx shorts thats the same color and length as the skirt to get a nice smooth look, or even wear with nothing at all if thats comfortable to you. If your self consious about having a muffin top, i cant see this skirt doing you any justice. Also, although the shape and style really accentuate your curves in a good way, it is difficult to walk in because its constricting all the way to the knees so you're only able to take short steps and not able to break it down on the dance floor. Aside from minimal sizing issues since body shapes vary so much, the costume overall is amazing quality. Also the straps are fully adjustable which is great! reviewText: I was very excited to see this. It reminds me of the pricey latex versions, but at a fraction of the price. After a shipping mixup I finally got it in the mail. Since it is to be worn at a dark club party, that is a bummer. The sleeves are actually bell shaped sleeves which you can't tell from the photo. I think I'll alter them so they are like normal sleeves. Best of all, I was debating ordering a Medium or a Large since costumes, especially from overseas companies, tend to be oversized. But the size Large fit perfect. I am a 36DD-38DD chest, 28 waist, 39 hip for reference. The fabric is that nice but cheap shiny faux vinyl, but a little on the thicker side, more subtle shine than the costumey glittery version. The other review says they only got 2 garters, mine has 4 as it is supposed to. It looks amazing on, very flattering. I want to wear the romper part as a bathing suit. Seriously.  Just enough stretch in the fabric. Overall, I am very happy with it. Just wish the colors on the front were better. Can't wait to wear it!

Thanks...for a craptastic experience. In other news..my mom now has a nifty costume. She's a medium by the way..fits like a glove.

Bridge Bunny Uniform to win all bunny uniforms!  The fit is perfect, the construction is VERY authentic as is the fabric.  I have no issues with this at all.  If there was any detail that was a bit lacking... The badge is slightly too large and I believe for authenticity, the slit in the skirt should be complete with a 3-4 inch overlap, this has the slit in the front layer but not in the underneath wrap.  I am sure that makes no sense.  No matter, I love this costume and have worn it both to a con and for halloween.

reviewText: The fabric is a sterduer make, so don't expect it to be soft (this also means it's not stretchy). Ultimately I quite like the design of it, but I ordered too small. Err on the side of bigger than you think.

Excellent value for the price! Appears to be well constructed of a durable cotton fabric and looks very authentic. Just for reference, I'm 5'7", about 135 lbs (36-28-38), slim but not tiny, and I have wide shoulders (about 18.5" from edge to edge). I always have the problem that if the shoulder and bust fit, it's loose in the waist, or it fits nicely in the waist area but the shoulders are tight. I wanted this costume to be form fitting and short like in the TOS. I bought a small and a med to be safe. The small came within days of ordering. It's fits, but is very tight in the shoulders and bust (as I suspected it might be). It's definitely wearable, but I looked forward to seeing the med might be better. This one was shipped from China and came about 2 weeks later. It fits perfectly in the bust and shoulder. but is not as form fitting in waist and hips.  I'm usually a small or medium, so I would say it's true to size, and it all depends on how you want it to fit. If you are large chested I would go up a size then alter the rest to fit as you like. I might alter the medium a bit in the waist and possibly shorten it a bit. But overall this is an excellent value, and looks great.
Just so perfect!! I felt like a real member of the Federation! It was a bit short, but I wore leggings with it.
summary: Just so perfect!! I felt like a real member of ...

reviewText: The sleeves of the dress were relatively short, which was about the only thing that bothered me. The fabric was different than I expected, a rougher cotton material, but not bad.
