reviewText: Very pleased with this product. Ordered it for Halloween, and I'm exited to wear it. I was nervous about the fit, but I ordered a small (my usual size) and it fit almost perfectly, form fitting but not too tight. The sleeves are slightly wide on my arms, and it could maybe fit my hips a little better, but seeing as it wasn't custom made I can hardly complain (I have tiny wrists) The fabric is  not velor, but is a nice durable cotton blend, a lot like a men's polo shirt, and it seems to be well made. There were a few threads loose on the starfleet badge, but it doesn't look like it will be much of an issue. It was a great deal, and arrived earlier than expected (So I probably didn't need to pay the extra 20 for fast shipping, but oh well) It's not an exact replica of the dresses on the show, (rank stripes are slightly higher, fabric is cotton and not velor, as mentioned, badge is embroidered golden thread as opposed to shiny fabric, and the collar is a bit higher and tighter, as opposed to the loose cowl we see on the show) but it's more than close enough, especially for the price. It looks just like the product image (other than the fact that my rank bands are slightly higher than shown) so you basically get what you expect. It is super short, just like the originals, but that's what I wanted. All and all pleased with both the service and the product, and will order from them again.
summary: Great product, especially for the price.

reviewText: Ummm I love it. Super cute and nice quality with some flirtiness. I got a red pair of boy shorts to go with it because it will show your tush if you bend even the slightest. I am 5'8 135 with a thicker waist and full chest and got a small. Its fits very well.

Please keep in mind that this dress is VERY short - just like it is in the original series - so you may want to wear shorts or leggings underneath when going out and about in it. All in all this is a great costume, well worth the price, and I'd recommend it to any Star Trek fan.

This dress is EXTREMELY accurate to the 1960s show - which means this skirt is going to hit you about mid-thigh. It is EXTREMELY short, and unless you plan on standing, sitting, or lean against something for the entire duration that you wear it, I'd recommend getting biking shorts / tights to wear under it. However, because I wanted it to be as show accurate as possible, the shortness of the skirt is a total plus for me.

Also - size UP. I got this in a large (when I probably could have gotten away with a medium, or even a small) based on the prior reviews, and they were not wrong. It's a little loose in the waist and not as vacuumed formed as I would have liked, but it shouldn't be so hard to get it taken in at the sides.

Overall, a solid, decently made costume for the price.

reviewText: perfect

I absolutely am very pleased with this item.  I wear a size 14 and took my measurements before ordering.  The bloomers fit like a glove.  I read in some of the reviews that some customers were experiencing uncomfortable rubbing on their legs from the lace border.  My pair has no harsh lace; it is very soft and does not irritate my skin at all.  Now I can wear my light weight long dresses in the summer and not worry about anyone being able to see through the dress on a sunny day.

Super comfortable without making me feel like I'm wearing grandma underwear.  This product works excellent under white, see-through pants.  In a pinch, they work well as emergency pajamas (like when one's luggage is lost).  The lace is an elegant touch.

Perfect! I was reluctant to buy this at first because I've gotten ripped off before from companies like this where the clothes seem "too good to be true" for the price, but after reading these reviews & even going on their website & seeing the pictures that people had taken of them in this dress & how they even said it looked EXACTLY like the picture, I decided to give it a try. I was nervous about buying a small because I'm in-between a small & medium. However, it fit just right. Yes, the back part is slightly see-through, so wearing some white shorts underneath or just white underwear would help. It's made very well, not like any of that cheap "made in a factory in China & then shipped right to you" stuff where the stitching is all over the place & not sewn well. I'm pleasantly surprised by the product, & I plan on buying from Shein again soon.
summary: PERFECT! Buying from them again soon

reviewText: I ordered the flower 2 bag for school books. I am an older student and wanted a crossbody tote that was quality without being too formal. This is perfect for me. It is all leather except inside lining, the flowers are leather and not glued on, the leather underneath has been cut to allow each flowers petals to come out of the bag ( I hope that makes sense) from the inside. There is and outside zipper pocket not too deep, two inside slip pockets and a zipper to close the bag. A very good zipper I must say, it's smooth and is easy to hold. This is a quality item, a lot of time has been put into making this unique well made bag. The shoulder crossbody strap is thick enough that I know it will hold up well, it is nice and long and can hang below my hips (I'm 5 8), has thick silver looks like stainless clasps. There are all different colors and will be great in all seasons. It is fun yet sophisticated, classy and playful.

reviewText: I love this bag!!!
Had to put it outside for a few days to get rid of the smell.  It's different that's for sure but I like it.

I love this purse, and 3 out of 4 of my cats find it desirable to sit on. It is gigantic and should be called a travel tote or cat carrier, although I don't know how many of my cats would enjoy being zipped in. You could put your laptop, iPad, Kindle, 100 ink pens, some thumb drives, 15 hair brushes, a make up kit, and your work sweater in there. Oh, and your little bag of chargers and an asthma inhaler. I recommend putting all these items in small clear make up bags because if they are just loose in there you will have to physically crawl in wearing one of those helmets with a flash light on it. I am thinking of getting a Murphy bed installed in mine in case I get tired at work or have overnight guests.

There is a pretty strong smell about it, as others have noted, but after its first day accompanying me to work it has either begun to fade or I've gotten used to it. Or, it might be that the rose sachet they put inside of it has really kicked up it's sacheting. Nice touch, actually. I like the sachet situation. Besides, it's so stinking cute that it can handle the smell.

Speaking of handles, it comes with a shoulder strap which was the selling point for this style. The back of the strap is nylon web. It does its job.
summary: Three of of Four Cats Will Sit On It

I hate carrying a purse but need to for a few items and want it to be as unobtrusive as possible.  This purse is flat and the leather is supple.  It will be perfect to take to concerts or any event where you're walking around and want something that will be secure and hold a few items that you can't fit into pockets or you just don't have pockets. Length of strap is perfect for me 5'2' and seems like it would work for most people.  I won't use the handle, but nice to have the option.

I have bought hundreds of purses, wristlets, bags, and other iPhone accessories over the years, never quite finding the right one.  THIS IS IT!  I can throw this in a tote when I'm carrying a lot of junk and use it as a wallet, and then just slip it out of the tote and use it as a cross-body bag that fits my license, a few cards, cash, a pair of glasses (readers or sunnies), and my phone!  It's so light that I forget I have it on.  The strap is thin and light so it doesn't bother my neck at all.  The cross-body strap can be interchanged with a wristlet strap, but I think the purse is just a tad too large for a wristlet, so I just use the long strap.
The leather is soft and supple, so I expect this bag will last me years even with daily use.  It's small and understated.  I wouldn't wear it for a formal evening, but for everyday, it's so unassuming that no one notices that it's a bit more on the casual side.

So, no, you can't pack a ton of stuff in it, but I like the construction because it means I can slip it easily into compartments of larger bags. The credit card slots are a little loose, and the zipper seems like it could be smoother, but both work fine.  I generally carry credit cards, chapstick, trial size tube of sunscreen, keys, charging cord & small battery pack for my phone, and a pen. Ever since purchasing my BIG iPhone 6s Plus, I have been on the hunt for a way to comfortably carry it when I did not want to carry my big purse.  I have back trouble and for times when I needed to walk long distances (like an outdoor art show) and was unable to carry my regular purse, an added plus would be to find something that had just a little extra room for credit cards and money.  Another requirement for me, or at least a strong preference, was for genuine full grain leather.  I wanted something that would be attractive, easy to carry, durable and functional.  Of course, I also figured that  if I ever found this elusive product, it would cost me a small fortune.  So I looked in stores, I searched through leather booths at art shows, kept my eyes open for something that would work every time we traveled to other places, always on the lookout for my special phone bag.  Then one day I decided to look on Amazon and that is how I found this one.

I couldn't believe the price for something that was suppose to be top grain leather.  But I read the description, read the reviews, viewed the pictures and decided to try it.  It seemed too perfect and I was prepared for disappointment.

Imagine my surprise and delight when my red beauty arrived and I realized it was everything it was advertised to be!  At least for me, this was the perfect solution to my dilemma.  I was immediately struck by the high quality exhibited in the craftsmanship of this bag.  The stitching was straight and even.  Even the hardware is heavy and beautifully finished and the bag is fully lined in a satiny material.  It is the perfect size for my phone in a wallet style case, plus it gives ample space for many cards, an inside zipper pocket and an open pocket for folding money, so that you don't even need a wallet!  There is also an outside zipper pocket that you can either wear out or next to your body for added security of the contents.  The color was much richer than the picture indicated and the leather is oh so soft and supple!  The shoulder strap is long and adjustable, and rather than the plastic edging on the strap that others use that cracks and quickly becomes unsightly, this is lined with a heavy woven tape that matches the color of the leather perfectly.  An added bonus is the removable wrist strap for those times when you do not want or need the shoulder strap.  In my last picture, you can see from the zipper tab what the thickness of the leather is and the suppleness is apparent.

I am so glad that I took a chance on this bag.  It is everything they claimed it to be and I doubt that I could have designed anything more perfect for my specific need.  I would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone.  It is durable, functional and beautiful!  I also see more colors in my future  :-)
summary: Incredible quality for the price - Perfect for large phones!

I bought this purse to carry inside my briefcase to go to lunch or wherever while at work. I would not call this a "Smarphone wallet." This is a small purse/clutch (about the size of a folded in half piece of standard-size paper) with a compartment in it (as many purses have) that can store your smartphone. It is relatively light, so it would still serve my purposes, but is not what I wanted or expected - the photo with the phone inside of the purse shows the phone in the inner small side-pourch, but I thought it was in the main compartment, so I was under the impression the purse was smaller than it actually is.

Because the purse is a purse rather than a wallet, the shoulder strap would be more useful than the wriststrap (at least for me). The shoulder strap that it comes with is not impressive - while the metal details are nice and sturdy, the strap is made of ugly fabric on one side with a smaller strip of leather sewn to it. It actually makes me think of the strap that I used to carry my saxophone with in junior high.

The purse itself and the wriststrap are both soft leather, and the zipper is a nice accent (I ordered black, which comes with gold zippers). I just received this purse in the mail, so cannot yet speak to the durability of it, though I can see spots where the leather is already cracking along the seam.

Because of the leather's quality, the size, and the unappealing shoulder strap, this bag is going back. In theory, the purse would be nice, but the quality is just not quite there, unless you want to buy another one in a few weeks.
summary: Disappointed by Size and Leather Quality

It comes with a wrist strap and a cross body strap--both detachable, which is a bonus! I attached 2 pics to show the quality of this beautiful wristlet. (Please look at the manufacturer's pictures for a better example of the sapphire color) Overall, it is constructed of high-quality materials and every woman should have at least one at this incredibly low price!

Ordered on 10/3/15 & arrived on 10/6/15 fast. Very pleased with the quality. Well made, perfect size and sleek. I'm on crutches. It fits my iPhone 6+ with the bell in commuter case, charging cord, work keys, slim card holder for work key card and credit card, and a lipstick easily. Perfect! At least for what I was looking for. I didn't want to a bulky bag but did want to still be fashionable. Great buy, especially for the price.

Love the soft leather. This purse can be used as a wristlet clutch or crossbody. Very nice hardware. There's an outer zip pocket, fits my iPhone 6, and an inner zip pocket plus two slip pockets. I was even able to squeeze my sunglasses in. The only thing that would make it better would be if the crossbody strap were all leather instead of cotton webbing on the back.

This beautiful, high quality leather clutch was delivered as promised in a timely manner.  I am thrilled with it's appearance as an evening clutch, as a phone case alone.......I just toss it into my oversized hobo bag or briefcase each morning.  I just started carrying an iPhone 6 plus and was a bit self-conscious about its size when not using it for work.  This little beauty affords me the space I need to keep the phone in a protective cover when I want/need a more stylish, but streamlined, carrying case.  Thank You!!!

This bag is very lovely, dependable,  and very well made. I'm already using it at my job as a waitress which is very helpful with carrying change and bills. However I do use it in other ways as well. I'm a couponer. So to make my grocery trips easier and quicker sometimes I just want to pull out the coupons I need and take them with me to the grocery store instead of my big binder. I can do this with the Riverside wallet. I can easily organize my coupons in the different categories I would like and place them in the different compartments without wrinkling them since the sections are so wide and deep. Not only can i use the holster to hold the wallet but there's enough room to place grocery store ads and shopping list as well.
The whole assemble is very well made with great quality leather, the stitching,  the gold button closures, the chain link which secures the holster to the wallet, the gold snap closure which secures the wallet closed and the many compartments within the wallet.
The holster is about 5 inches wide and about 9 1/3 of an inch in length. It has a pouch, which is about 46 inches in measurement, in the front to place whatever you may like and a smaller pouch on the side which is about 25 inches in measurement to hold something small like a pen. The inside of the holster is lined with a nylon cloth which makes it easier to slide the wallet in and out.
The wallet is 73 1/2 inches in measurements when closed.  The wallet is lined with the same cloth as the holster and the compartments measures about 3 inches deep.  There is total of nine compartments inside and outside of the wallet including the zippered pouch on the inside. The snap closure which you press down to open the wallet has three adjustable notches to secure it when closed. The chain link is optional to be used since it has hooks on each to side. On both the holster and the wallet LEABAGS is embroidered on the front of each one.  I am really enjoying this whole ensemble because it has so much versatility and it will never go out of style. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review and all opinions are mine.
summary: Very versatile and i use it for my coupons

The material is thin, breathable, almost gauze-like without being transparent and has a slip sewn into it underneath that is also a cotton mix. Unfortunately also with the  A line shape beginning at the bust, empire style, I felt like it added the appearance of weight to my already curvy figure.  It was also too large from the  waist down.  I don't think the Hi-low hem  is particularly attractive on a shorter curvy figure as it might be on someone who is taller and slightly more slender. Absolutely beautiful! The dress is exactly as represented online, with all the colors being just as rich and deep. It's a very flattering dress, though because of the front cut it's best worn with higher boots, or the calves will look a little odd. I purchased the dress for very casual wear, but just to test it ou, I threw on some progressive house and danced away for half an hour with the dress on. It not only held up well, but the material is very high quality, the seaming very well enforced, and the lacing is good quality and stood up to the test of me hopping around and thrashing. What a great purchase! I'm now ready to buy the same dress in other colors, esp the ivory for the coming spring. Really glad I took the risk, as you never know what to expect when you buy clothes online. Highly recommend! Very true to size, except in the bust, which is fairly normal these days. If you have an ample bosom, be prepared for them to be the highlight of this dress, because they will be hanging out unless you wear a binding camisole tank underneath!
summary: Absolutely beautiful! The dress is exactly as represented online

reviewText: Love it!!

I feel ultra feminine & beautiful when I put this on! It's made well and designers have thought of the things a woman would want in this item! It's definitely complimentary to a woman's figure, regardless of size! I'm not a small or huge girl, but I am curvy and it seems to accentuate the right places for a girl's full figure! And NO it is not tight on me, it's just very flattering! There's a lining that extends to approx upper thigh (I'm 5' 6) and a few hook and eyes for a better fit in the upper bodice, or breast area (it seems most manufacturers just don't go to the trouble of including these extra items women want and or need anymore!!) But with these items it gives allowance for different breast sizes,which can make ALL the difference! The bodice also leaves option for cami to show through, or to adjust amount of skin you're comfortable with showing. I ordered my normal size & it fit SO perfect!  Love the long flowing sleeves and the embroidery it's done tastefully, and  I ordered during Utah winter thinking of wearing with jeans or leggings, possibly as a cape or layering item, but it's definitely more of a dress, sewn together all around, I've been wearing it during winter as a dress with tall boots (as shown), as long as I know I won't be out in the cold long, and I'll still layer it for the winter because it's so versatile and I really do love it! Can't wait to wear it this spring & summer!
summary: So complimentary to a woman's curves!

I received my dress earlier than the expected delivery date so that was a bonus. It was well packaged . I love the dress.  I ordered a Large. I did contact the seller after I placed my order (which I should have done before I ordered) I gave my measurements and they did confirm that Large was the size to go with.  I'm 5ft 3 inches  waist 29 inches
 chest 36DD and  I weigh 129lbs. The dress itself skims/drapes my body nicely. The chest area fits nicely not too loose nor too tight. It shows just the right amount of cleavage too look classy yet kinda sexy. (If that's the look u want) . If your measurements are similar to mine and you'd like a more "flowy/boho look or would want to wear a tank or camisole underneath then I'd size up. For ladies who would want a more fitted look up top and similar chest measurements you could probably size down BUT I don't believe a padded /push-up bra would work the bra itself would need to be unpadded.  The material is nice and soft gauzy feeling. The embroidery was well done. The colors were different than what was shown in photos. They were more of a purple pinky pastels which I like better....(I ordered the Black dress). I noticed  areas like around the neckline and hem that some of the threading is slightly loose...which can easiy be fixed. I personally am not concered with it but maybe after a few washings i may have to tighten up threads with a few stitche. There is a nice light liner sewn into the dress so it is not see-thru. Maybe with the lighter colored dress's  but you can always wear nude colored Shapers of some sort underneath if there is a concern. So when trying to figure out a size to order you must look at the measurements that are shown by the seller NOT Amazons sizing chart. In other reviews I read there  is a small percentage of customers that said the measurements shown were way off by several cm  ....I did not find this to be an issue for me. 99% of the dress fit perfectly in the way I like my clothing to fit. The 1% is that the sleeves could of been a little longer but overall the dress is a fantastic buy and at a great price . I will be ordering the white one and the pinkish one as well. One more thing ...I tried a corset over top of the dress just for fun and it seems like the dress was made to to have a corset worn with it. I think it's a great idea especially with with Octoberfest  coming up...it would make for a great outfit.

reviewText: really cute dress

I love this dress. I bought it because I just loved it, even though my bust size is well outside of the fit range. I figured at worst I could modify it into an open front jacket.

Well, I got it and I fell in love with it. I discovered this very quickly; I ordered a Large and I went sans bra...and it fit. Sure...it looked a bit busty, but the dress provides natural support. It was comfortable and light. I got a TON of compliments and I watched as two separate people pulled our their phones and order the dress.

Minor Cons:

The clasps at the front are not the most sturdy. In fact, one came off when I went to hook it (More than enough room to clasp it over my chest, the thread holding it looked like it had come loose at some point and it pulled free as I manipulated it) and the second one wasn't even secured on all the way. I have heavier hooks and it took all of 5 minutes to put new ones on and it's perfect, so check the threads before you go out or you could have a wardrobe malfunction.

It's definitely shorter than it looks in the pictures, but not horribly so. The model image makes it look longer and fuller than it is...but it's still wonderful. I wish it was about 6" longer and just a bit more fabric to make a fuller skirt, but that's just personal preference.

All in all, it's beautiful. I'll be ordering another white one and two of the blues.

I'm very sad about the quality of this dress. The dress that was sent is obviously a cheap knock off of the very pretty dress advertised I'm the image. I purchased several dresses from Amazon, and have came to the conclusion that most are cheap knock offs made to imitate good quality clothing shown in images. I am 5/4 125lbs, dbl c chest, ordered size large. The dress runs very small, tight chested, way shorter than shown in "image" poor quality stitching, dry and thin material that feels awful to touch. I have learned a valuable lesson.. Images of clothing on Amazon are of pretty and good quality clothing, however you will likely get cheap quality knock off only worth 1/8 of the actual price you pay for it clothing. Amazon needs to monitor their sellers to insure quality items are actually being sent to customers as shown and advertised in their images.. No more Amazon clothing purchases for this family. Stick to thrift stores and retail stores.

The outer zippered pocket fits my cell phone. Great value for the price. Seems sturdy and like it will hold up well over time.

Has good structure, thick canvas and the handle straps are sewn on so it if these need to be repaired it can be done.  I bought the black one with rust brown handles. I want to buy another one in the khaki color. Very versatile and can hold a lot if needed, plus the bag itself is not heavy. Its kind of a bottomless pit finding things but at least you know its in there somewhere. I keep my small cross body purse in there along with an extra change of yoga cloths,  a cashmere sweater/scarf, my kindle, and makeup bag. I've used it once as an emergency overnight bag when I had to catch a flight directly from my office without going home first (two nights three days) and it worked out very well.

It's large enough to where I can fit all the items I need on a daily basis along with a lunch box to take for work, but it's not so big to where I feel like I'm taking a duffel bag with me. The bag is also clearly well made, it has nice stitching and is sturdy. I received the bag before it was expected to be delivered, and as an added bonus I got it on my birthday. By Day 4 the square that held the main zipper together came off, and I had no top zipper. I was on vacation, and having to live with it. By day 5, items in my purse we going through a hole between the lining and the outside of the purse. This bag is shoddy in structure. I would tell anyone not to order this bag! I expect a refund shortly.

This belt adjusts to exactly where it feels comfortable and is super easy to adjust on the fly. Way easier to put on than a "normal" belt and it doesnt wear itself down with the bend in the loop like most belts. The only downside could be the fact that everyone knows when your tightening your belt since it makes a small clicking noise as you do but you will be hearing that all over once everyone realises how much better ratchet belts are.

reviewText:
I am a bathing suit fanatic and absolutely love going shopping and getting new suits to wear to the beach or to the pool.

The top of the bathing suit is super cute. I love the design in the back with the mutilple ladder-like straps. I also love the scoop in the front. The size of the top was smaller than I expected and I should've gotten one size bigger. I could not take an appropriate photo of me wearing it because of the size. The top fit but it was really right and kindve uncomfortable. It's stretchy but not stretchy enough for me. It also comes with removable padding!

The bottoms are cute also. I just love the pattern on this bathing suit and the colors, it goes great with my personality. The bottoms for perfectly, I usually fit into a medium bottom, but these were a large. Because they run smaller they fit like a medium. There are ties on both sides of the bathing suit which I love because it gives it an extra amount of cuteness rather than just the regular bottoms without any strings hanging.

I would recommend this bathing suit for sure, just always consider the sizing chart and possibly go up a size from your normal one. Clothing companies varries when it comes to the fabric they're using and the sizing they make them. I really wish the top would've been one size bigger.

Disclaimer: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

I do not have a RFID reader, so I cannot test out that aspect but I will tell you my opinion on this product as a wallet. This beautiful wallet has two gold zipper closures; one compartment has 8 accordion folds that can hold up to 12 cards, and a pocket for cash or change. I opened my package and that wonderful leather scent wafted out. I really don't know how to test the RFID part but as a wallet this palm-sized pocketbook gets 5 stars. There is a light texture on the outside and the brand is stamped in one corner. The first zippered compartment that holds the card slots is beg enough for my credit cards, and coupons or rewards cards both to keep them together. When completely full, the wallet can double in width. The only thing I am used to having that this lacks is a clear slot for a driver's license or Identification Card. The other zippered  compartment has two sleeves for IDs or I used it for gift cards, and an opened pocket for cash or coins (or thin pad if that is what is needed!) I love that it takes up HALF the space in my already small purse than my previous wallet. Added security bonus- prevents scammers from scanning your wallet for personal information. AWESOME. I was sent these products free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. All opinions are my own.
summary: I have more room now than with my other wallet with the same contents.

reviewText:
This little wallet is super cute! It's a bright pink color that is easily spotted in my deep, dark mess of a purse. The leather quality is amazing and there is so much space in this little beauty. Now let's get to the really cool thing. Have you realized that there is a device called a RFID that can scan your wallet to read your credit cards/ID card? That is scary considering the person standing right next to you could be stealing your information as we speak. This little gem stops that from happening. There is a blocking device built into this wallet that blocks RFID's from being able to read your information. This is a great little wallet for traveling over seas or anywhere really!

reviewText:
This wallet is very cute and when you add in the RFID blocking technology that just makes it a million times more functional. I have enclosed a picture of the wallet pulled opens looking down in. You can see one side is open, which I would assume is for change/money, and the other side is for credit cards.

It does seem very roomy on the inside, as in that it would hold plenty of cards, cash, and change with out worry about it being over stretched it hard to zipper. Additionally I love the handle that's attached that turns the ordinarily wallet into a viper cute clutch for on the go!

My main issues with this are first of all while the clutch is great in height it doesn't have much in the way of legenth so I can fit my phone inside (not do I thing any modern smart phone would squeeze inside). When I typically bring a clutch I want to be able to fit all my essential inside.

 Note I did receive this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my fair and honest review. All opinions expressed are solely my own and are completely honest.

This is an excellent wallet!!

The wallet arrived packaged nicely in a little box, with some tissue paper covering it to protect the leather.  The wallet is made of a very high-quality, super smooth and soft leather. I purchased the pink one and the color is amazingly vivid!

I was able to shove all 23 of my different cards in this wallet--my credit and debit cards, my driver's license, library cards, etc.  I also added a small wad of bills. The wallet was jammed pack, but it held everything nicely.  I have since re-organized and am carrying much less in it.  The wallet is the perfect size for me--not too bulky, but is large enough to have room for everything.

Perhaps the biggest selling point of this wallet is that it is a RFID-blocking wallet.  If you haven't heard of RFID, you really need to.  People can stand next to you and, with the help of today's amazing technology, they can steal your credit card information just by standing next to you.

This wallet prevents anyone from getting your credit card information.  To make sure it was as good as they say, I asked a friend of mine to use her device and test it. Sure enough, it works perfectly!

 Absolutely pertinent in today's world!

Love my wallet! I am going to buy a couple for friends with upcoming birthdays!

DISCLAIMER: I received this wallet at a deep discount in order to give it a try and write an honest and unbiased review.
Makes for a safer outing, knowing that the cards can not be scanned by cons.

I simply placed 2 id cards and 2 different credit cards which still leaves more slots open....and the zipper immediately busted.  I was able to put the zipper back on track and the next time I open and closed it.....was real careful and didn't tug otherwise, it would come off track again.  This is disappointing because as we all know, when making a purchase in a store....we're not always able to take the time to carefully and slowly open and close the zipper.....I just know it won't last long.  They really need to upgrade to a higher quality zipper.  Otherwise, the wallet is very nice.

This Leopardd  RFID Identity Safe Wallet was provided to my wife in exchange for an honest review.  She wrote:  "This beautiful wallet contains 2 zippered sections with one section containing 10 separate credit card folders (each folder is large enough for 3-4 credit cards) and the other section is one large folder  ample enough to hold dollar bills and change. The wallet comes in several colors (my choice was red) and the small size (just slightly larger than the dimensions of a credit card) makes it so handy to keep in a pocket or handbag. I have wrestled with organizing my credit cards for years and this is a perfect solution as it is easy to open the wallet and immediately see which credit card I need at a store instead of fumbling around trying to find just the right card.  Best of all the RFID feature prevents thieves from stealing credit card information. I would recommend this wallet to anyone wanting to keep their credit cards organized and safe."

First let me say that I think this wallet is super cute and I love the style - the color is perfectly me and what's more is, it is functional, too!  It can hold 10 cards or combos of cards and folded money (two of which are "hidden" - awesome!).  I wanted to be sure it worked, so I slipped my employee ID for work into the badge and attempted to scan the wallet at the entrance - the scanner did not pick up my ID and I had to remove my employee ID from the wallet in order to scan it.  Knowing that it was unable to scan my ID made me feel confident in taking this with us on our trip out of the country.  This was the perfect travel wallet and held everything I needed - a definite must have for traveling!
summary: Wonderful RFID Blocking wallet that really works!

reviewText:
The product is a good one - does it's job and is easy to install in the hatband.  That got it 3 stars.  It would have been good enough for 5 stars if it weren't for the incredible frustration [like most everyone else had] of separating the backing from the foam.  ARGH!  Yes, ultimately the right knife worked.  The knife I used was a Swiss army knife with a very sharp, very clean, very thin 2" blade.  It was still no cakewalk.  I wasted the better part of a foot of the tape with false starts.  Most times when I gently, carefully, steadily attempted to insert the blade between the foam and white backing a fine layer of foam remained on the tape. That fine layer made it impossible to pull the two layers apart.
I have a suggestion if you decide to buy this product: Don't cut all the sections of the foam and tape that you'll need at the start.  Every piece will require another session with the knife.  Start with the beginning of the whole roll.  Try to get the corners or edge of the beginning separated with your knife.  If you end up trashing the the end without separating the layers, cut the end off so you have a new edge to work with.  Eventually if the hat gods are kind you'll free a tiny bit of the backing from the foam.  Now using your fingernail increase the separation until you can grasp the foam in one hand and the backing in the other.  Peel the layers apart til you have the right length.  Cut ONLY the foam piece off leaving the tape still attached to the roll.  Once you've placed that first piece in your hat it should be pretty easy to start peeling apart the next section you need.  When your hat is the right size leave a tape tail on the end of the roll so you have something to grab the next time.
summary: The product is a good one - does it's job and is easy to ...

I have a small head, which makes it very difficult if not impossible for me to find hats which fit me since most of them I like are 'one size'. They come down too far on my head, slide around, blow off in the wind, and don't look that great either. In the past I've ordered some pre-sized sizers made of felt which were not adjustable to how much you need, and expensive too. Then I found this tape, it's amazing! As soon as I got it today I put it in the 10 hats I have which are anywhere from a little to big, to a lot too big. Being able to create the perfect amount needed was very easy and my hats all fit and look great!

I read several comments it's hard getting the tape off the back, but I didn't have that issue with this trick. I bent back firmly a small amount on one or two corners, and that way it made it a lot easier to separate the tape from the foam. I did 10 hats in a short period of time, super easy!

reviewText:
This is such a lovely and comfortable summer dress!

 I have been admiring clothing by Outline and Jiqiuguer (sister companies) online for a little while now, and finally took the plunge and started purchasing from their clothing lines.  I am so happy with the clothing from these companies! Not only are their garments wonderful, but my communication with them has been very prompt and courteous.

I was really excited about this dress arriving. With the summer heat, I was looking for something that would be loose and flowing, nice on my skin, and look really pretty.  This dress is gorgeous!  The color is exactly what I saw online, if you look at the pictures of the dress on the model.  The close up shots of the fabric make it look darker than it really is.  I ordered the grey, although I would describe it as "grey with a very subtle hint of purple".  I really like that the overlay of the dress is a darker grey, and the under piece is a lighter grey.  The bottom hem is asymmetrical, which adds to the feminine flow of the dress.

The fabric is comfortable - it feels like a cotton.  It has a linen look to it, although I don't think it is actually linen - but I think another reviewer brought that up.  That being said, the fabric is still easy and cool to wear in the summer.  It looks very cute with sandals, flats, or Mary Janes.

I am 5'3" and 130 pounds.  I typically wear a US size 4, and am normally a small.  I was nervous about sizing (since it is an Asian company) and I ended up ordering a medium.  I was worried that it would end up being too form fit, when I really wanted something really loose.  I was also worried about shrink factor during laundering. I probably could have gotten away with the small, but I think the medium is pretty perfectly sized for me.  Because it is meant to be loose, I used the bust size as my primary consideration.  I feel as if it is true to size, if you use their size chart, not Amazon's. Their size chart is located in the product description section.

I think I'll be able to wear this into the fall with a short-sleeved top layered underneath it.  I could probably even get away with this into the winter with  close-fitting long sleeved top and some boots!

 I absolutely love this dress, and will be purchasing more clothing from this line!  Wonderful dress!
summary: This dress is gorgeous! Easy and cool to wear in the summer!  I love this dress!
